item.title: Mastering PowerShell- Automating User Management and Service Monitoring
item.description: Introduction As a PowerShell enthusiast, I’m excited to dive into the practical challenges presented in this PowerShell interview scenario. PowerShell is a powerful and versatile tool that can streamline various administrative tasks, and in this post, we’ll explore how to tackle the two key scenarios outlined in the provided content. Scenario 1: Capitalizing User Names and Assigning Administrator Rights In this scenario, we have a CSV file containing a list of user names that are incorrectly capitalized.
